summary: This is a warranty deed and associated property transfer documents recording the sale of Great St. James Island in the US Virgin Islands from Christian Kjaer (also known as Poul Christian Tage Kjaer) to Great St. Jim, LLC for $17,500,000. The documents include notarization, tax clearance, and cadastral certification, showing the transfer of ownership of the island property.

persons.name: Christian Kjaer
persons.context: Individual selling Great St. James Island to Great St. Jim, LLC for $17.5 million. Also identified as Poul Christian Tage Kjaer.

persons.name: Poul Christian Tage Kjaer
persons.context: Alternative name for Christian Kjaer, the seller of Great St. James Island, who signed the warranty deed.

persons.name: Kevin F. D'Arnour
persons.context: Address contact for Christian Kjaer at 5143 Palm Passage, Suites 188 and 198, St. Thomas, USVI.

persons.name: Karen Elisabeth Kjaer
persons.context: Previous owner of Great St. James Island whose estate conveyed the property to Christian Kjaer in 1987.

persons.name: Erica Dover
persons.context: Recorder of Deeds for St. Thomas/St. John who recorded the warranty deed on January 28, 2016.

persons.name: Ann-Kath Notalic Ravgaard
persons.context: Notary public in Denmark who notarized Christian Kjaer's signature on the warranty deed on January 18, 2016.

persons.name: Ludence Romney
persons.context: Tax Collector for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor, Division of Real Property Tax, who certified no outstanding real property tax obligations for the property.

connections.description: Seller-buyer relationship for the $17.5 million sale of Great St. James Island.
Christian Kjaer inherited Great St. James Island from the estate of Karen Elisabeth Kjaer in 1987.
Kevin F. D'Arnour appears to be serving as a legal or correspondence contact for Christian Kjaer in the property transaction.

events.title: Property Tax Clearance Certification
events.description: Tax Collector Ludence Romney certified no outstanding real property tax obligations for Great St. James Island up to and including 2015.

events.title: Notarization of Warranty Deed in Denmark

events.title: Recording of Warranty Deed
events.description: Recorder of Deeds Erica Dover recorded the warranty deed transferring Great St. James Island from Christian Kjaer to Great St. Jim, LLC.

events.title: Previous Property Transfer to Christian Kjaer
events.description: Final adjudication of the estate of Karen Elisabeth Kjaer conveyed Great St. James Island to Christian Kjaer.

keyFacts: Great St. James Island was sold by Christian Kjaer (aka Poul Christian Tage Kjaer) to Great St. Jim, LLC for $17,500,000 in January 2016.
The property consists of three parcels totaling approximately 80.1 acres (56.1 acres, 4.2 acres, and 19.8 acres).
Christian Kjaer originally acquired the property in 1987 from the estate of Karen Elisabeth Kjaer (aka Karin Lis Kjaer).
The transaction involved notarization in Denmark and recording in the US Virgin Islands, indicating international property transfer.
Tax clearance was certified showing no outstanding real property tax obligations for the property up to 2015.
